statements: SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY package_id DESC;
SELECT destination, package_name FROM tour_packages WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages WHERE destination LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY package_name DESC;
SELECT package_name, destination FROM tour_packages WHERE price < 5000 ORDER BY price ASC, package_name ASC;
SELECT package_id, destination FROM tour_packages WHERE package_name LIKE '%beach%' AND destination = 'Hawaii';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE destination = 'Paris' OR destination = 'Rome' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 AND destination IN ('Japan', 'Australia') ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT package_id, description FROM tour_packages ORDER BY package_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, review FROM customer_feedback WHERE review ILIKE '%great%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY package_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT package_name, description FROM tour_packages WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE description LIKE '%beach%' OR description LIKE '%sun%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages JOIN customer_feedback ON tour_packages.package_id = customer_feedback.package_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, package_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT tp.package_name, cf.customer_name, cf.review FROM tour_packages tp JOIN customer_feedback cf ON tp.package_id = cf.package_id WHERE cf.rating = 5 ORDER BY tp.package_name ASC, cf.customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE package_id = 1;
SELECT guide_name, available_date FROM tour_guide_availability WHERE available_slots > 0 ORDER BY available_date ASC;
SELECT package_id, package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_guide_availability WHERE available_date = '2022-08-15';

SELECT package_name, destination, price, customer_name, rating FROM tour_packages JOIN customer_feedback ON tour_packages.package_id = customer_feedback.package_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY price ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT guide_name, available_date, available_slots FROM tour_guide_availability WHERE available_slots > 5 AND available_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_id, package_name, destination FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, rating, comment FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT guide_name, availability_date FROM tour_guide_availability ORDER BY availability_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_id, package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, package_name, rating FROM customer_feedback INNER JOIN tour_packages ON customer_feedback.package_id = tour_packages.package_id;
SELECT guide_name, availability_date, available_slots FROM tour_guide_availability WHERE available_slots > 0 ORDER BY availability_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, package_name, guide_name, booking_date FROM tour_booking INNER JOIN tour_packages ON tour_booking.package_id = tour_packages.package_id INNER JOIN tour_guide_availability ON tour_booking.guide_id = tour_guide_availability.guide_id ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tour_packages;
SELECT package_name, destination FROM tour_packages WHERE price > 500;
SELECT package_name, price FROM tour_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, package_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM tour_packages ORDER BY destination DESC, price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, package_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, package_id ASC;
SELECT guide_name, available_date, available_time FROM tour_guide_availability WHERE available_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY available_date ASC, available_time ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT guide_name, guide_phone FROM tour_guides ORDER BY guide_name ASC;
